backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining stable state and CRUD operations for user profiles, districts, and villages, with role-based access control (admin/user) and mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that passes actor state through unchanged, preserving nextDistrictId and nextVillageId across canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting an investigation into the VillagesSection not rendering in production due to empty stable state or data sync issues between draft and production canisters.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose, styling palette, and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base with OKLCH color token variables for light and dark modes, defining the design system's color, border, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Hindi-language foundation site, loading Noto Serif/Sans Devanagari and Cinzel fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing hash-based routing that renders AdminPanel at `#/admin` and the full homepage section stack (Hero through Footer) for all other routes.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying mission, vision, foundation history, and an 11-card core values grid with lucide-react icons using the maroon/gold palette.
frontend/src/components/ActivitiesSectio: Displays a section of activity cards fetched from the backend (with loading skeletons) and seeds activities on mount. Also shows static impact statistics in a dark-themed grid.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: A passcode-protected admin panel for managing districts, villages, donations, memberships, assistance requests, and contact inquiries, including a bulk import modal for district/village data.
frontend/src/components/AssistanceSectio: Renders a validated assistance request form that collects name, mobile number, city, and assistance type, then submits the data via a mutation hook with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays foundation contact info (address, phone, email, social links) fetched dynamically and provides a validated contact inquiry form with submission handling.
Renders a donation section with UPI QR code, copyable bank details, preset amount buttons, and a validated donor form that submits donation records via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the foundation branding, quick navigation links, a Quranic quote, and a copyright bar with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a responsive photo gallery grid of six foundation events with hover overlays and captions, with fallback handling for missing images.
frontend/src/components/GovernmentScheme: Shows a grid of six Indian government welfare schemes (housing, health, scholarships, etc.) with icons, descriptions, and eligibility details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with the foundation logo, desktop nav links, a mobile hamburger menu, a search icon, and smooth-scroll/hash routing logic including an admin link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-width hero banner with a background image, dark overlay, foundation name in Hindi/English, a tagline badge, and CTA buttons for donation and about sections.
frontend/src/components/MembershipSectio: Membership registration form with text fields (name, mobile, email, city, Aadhaar) and file upload fields for address and identity proof, submitting via a React Query mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: A modal search bar component that filters predefined Hindi/English site sections by keyword and scrolls to the matching section anchor on selection.
Displays an accordion list of districts fetched from the backend, each expandable to show its associated villages as chips loaded via a separate query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend data operations (activities, donations, memberships, assistance requests, contact inquiries, foundation info, districts, villages), currently stubbed to return empty data after a backend migration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Devanagari/Cinzel fonts, defines an oklch-based maroon/gold CSS variable theme, and declares reusable Tailwind component classes for the site's Islamic-inspired design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color palettes (maroon, tan, gold, cream), brand-specific font families, border radii, and semantic color tokens for the app's UI.
project_state.json: Project state tracker (version 45) documenting the Hindi-language charitable society app's architecture, color palette, existing features, and known bugs including admin panel issues and missing production sections.
